wiki.content: This Michael Bublé song is a cover of the Van Morrison song Moondance. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: This Michael Bublé song is a cover of the Van Morrison song Moondance.

name: Moondance
comments: ignore the dummy who called this a rod stewart song!!!!  Michael does a great job with this song and the arrangement is impecable.  To me this is and will always be Van the Man's breakout song.
like the morrison version a lot better.
Great voice. Reminds of the Golden Era!!!

Heard this while I was working at JCPenny, I tried to remember the lyrics but forgot and failed at trying to find it on google.  Heard it today, scrambled to find pen and paper to write down the lyrics and later on googled it.  Ohmygod where has this been all my life?!  LOVE.
not very many remakes I like better than the "original". This is one of them! It's almost as though this is how the song "shoulda been done".
Such a good cover!  You romance me Michael!
GREAT VERSION OF THIS OLD ROD STEWART NUMBER FROM THE YOUNG AMERICAN.
